post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: Hannah
comment.text: "When they call the roll in the Senate, the Senators do not know whether to answer 'Present' or 'Not Guilty"--- Theodore Roosevelt

replies.author: Jonathan
replies.text: Electing hillary now sends a message to our children that lying, cheating, and committing crimes are ok as long as you win. We need role models to lead by teaching what is appropriate. She sullies feminism and women worldwide. Women should never be portrayed as too weak to win fairly. Ever. That is neither feminist or progressive. Certainly not worth selling out my family, my kids, and myself for. Hillary is no martyr for women.

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Can't make BS smell like flowers. She's going to the slammer :)

replies.author: Hannah
replies.text: Dear Hillary Clinton; "You can fool all of the people some of the time, and some of the people all of the time, but you can not fool all of the people all of the time"--- Abraham Lincoln Put that in your pipe and smoke it..
